title: Picture music
brief_description: Presents a compilation of 20 contemporary rock-video clips. Includes such artists as Kim Carnes, Thomas Dolby, Kim Wilde, The Vapors, Hazel O’Connor Bow Wow Wow, Depeche Mode, The Tubes, Duran Duran and Kate Bush. Each video clip has its own director, no overall director or producer.
